Detailed Description

This class is a chunk item that tends a particle system.

bool ChunkParticles::setReflectionVis ( const bool &  reflVis  )  [inline]

void ChunkParticles::tick ( float  dTime  )  [virtual]

This method ensures that particle systems that are chunk items get seeded once they are placed in the world.

This is done for off-screen particles, in a staggered fashion.

Reimplemented from ChunkItemBase.
